text: The Joint Committee on the Draft Parliamentary Buildings Bill is a joint select committee of the House of Commons and House of Lords in the Parliament of the United Kingdom. The Committee was established in 2018 with a remit to consider the Draft Registration of Overseas Entities Bill. They are due to report on 10 May 2019. == Membership == As of 19 March 2019, the members of the committee are as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2" valign="top" |Member ! valign="top" |Party ! valign="top" |Constituency |- | bgcolor="" | |Peter Aldous MP |Conservative |Waveney |- | bgcolor="" | |Rt.
